requirements.summary: Display service listing page with repair services, descriptions, and pricing retrieved from backend
acceptanceCriteria: Display at least 3-5 common repair services (e.g., hardware repair, software troubleshooting, virus removal, data recovery, upgrades)
Each service shows a name, description, and price or price range
Services are stored in the backend and retrieved via query

file_operations.description: Create services listing page that fetches all services using getAllServices() backend method and displays them in a grid layout with name, description, and formatted price
Create React Query hook to fetch services from backend using getAllServices() method with loading and error states
Create reusable service card component to display individual service with name, description, and price formatted from bigint
Add route for /services that renders ServicesPage component

requirements.summary: Display product catalog page with computers and parts showing specifications and prices from backend
acceptanceCriteria: Display products in a grid or list layout
Each product shows image, name, key specifications, and price
Products are categorized (e.g., laptops, desktops, components)
Product data is stored and retrieved from the backend

file_operations.description: Create products catalog page that fetches all products using getAllProducts() backend method and displays them in a responsive grid with filtering by category
Create React Query hook to fetch products from backend using getAllProducts() method with caching and error handling
Create product card component displaying product name, specifications, price, and placeholder image with proper formatting
Add route for /products that renders ProductsPage component

requirements.summary: Implement service request form for customers to submit repair requests with validation and backend submission
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes fields for customer name, contact information, device type, and problem description
Form validates required fields before submission
Submitted requests are stored in the backend with a unique ID and timestamp
User receives confirmation after successful submission

file_operations.description: Create service request form page with fields for customerName, deviceDetails, and issueDescription that calls submitServiceRequest() backend method and shows success/error feedback
Create React Query mutation hook for submitting service requests using submitServiceRequest() method with optimistic updates and error handling
Create controlled form component with validation for required fields (customerName, deviceDetails, issueDescription) and submission handling
Add route for /request-service that renders RequestServicePage component and wire it into navigation

requirements.summary: Apply professional tech-focused visual theme with slate grays, electric greens, and crisp whites throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: Apply consistent color scheme throughout the application
Use modern, readable typography suitable for a technical service business
Create a professional layout with clear navigation and sections
Ensure visual hierarchy guides users through services, products, and contact options

file_operations.description: Update global styles to include tech-focused color palette with CSS custom properties for slate grays, electric greens, and crisp whites as primary theme colors
Extend Tailwind theme with custom colors for slate gray variants, electric green accents, and white backgrounds, plus modern typography settings for technical aesthetic
Create main layout component with header navigation, footer, and consistent spacing that applies theme colors and wraps all pages
Wrap all routes with Layout component to apply consistent theme and navigation structure across the application

requirements.summary: Display generated brand images including tech-themed logo and hero background as static assets
acceptanceCriteria: Display logo in the header/navigation area
Use hero background on the landing page
Images are properly sized and optimized for web display

file_operations.description: Add logo image to header navigation using src='/assets/generated/logo.dim_200x200.png' with proper alt text and sizing
Create landing page with hero section using frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x600.png as background image, featuring introductory content about Tech Service Hub services
Add route for / (root path) that renders HomePage component as the default landing page
